snippet.title: Dreams of Aether Launch Trailer | Rivals Micro Direct Version
snippet.description:
SURPRISE - Dreams of Aether, a new game in the Aetherverse, is available for FREE for 24 hours to celebrate April Fools! Dive into tons of Aether-flavored microgames, where everyone is trapped in a never-ending nightmare! 

This game is led by our friend Giik and his team at Lepioid with music by flashygoodness and RESOFORCE. Punch, Flap, and Swing your way through the dubiously-canon story, and see how far you can get in endless modes! Check it out on Steam here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3463050/Dreams_of_Aether/
